package.name: HTTP_WebDAV_Client
package.description: RFC2518 compliant stream wrapper that allows to use WebDAV server resources like a regular file system from within PHP.

release.notes: - fixed settings of mode flags for stat()/url_stat() - added missing authentication in lots of places - added support for rename() and mkdir() (PHP >= 5.0.0b3) - added lock support (experimental, requires PHP changes not yet in CVS)
lots of small improvements and additions, now waiting for missing pieces in the user streams interface ...
already usable but needs additional performance tuning and error checking
